price: Ndetse twanamuhaye igikundiro ari impuhwe ziduturutseho, tunamweza ibyaha kandi yubahaga Allah.
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
